
		<h1 class="postTitle">
			<a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/TheMagicalRainbowSea/p/18710886" title="发布于 2025-02-12 08:53">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">5. Docker 本地镜像发布到阿里云</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="5-docker-本地镜像发布到阿里云">5. Docker 本地镜像发布到阿里云</h1>
<p>@</p><div class="toc"><div class="toc-container-header">目录</div><ul><li><a href="#5-docker-本地镜像发布到阿里云" rel="noopener nofollow">5. Docker 本地镜像发布到阿里云</a></li><li><a href="#1-本地镜像发布到阿里云流程" rel="noopener nofollow">1. 本地镜像发布到阿里云流程</a></li><li><a href="#最后" rel="noopener nofollow">最后：</a></li></ul></div><p></p>
<hr>
<h1 id="1-本地镜像发布到阿里云流程">1. 本地镜像发布到阿里云流程</h1>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355158-1769758090.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>镜像的生成方法：</strong></p>
<p>基于当前容器创建一个新的镜像，新功能增强<br>
<code>docker commit [OPTIONS] 容器ID [REPOSITORY[:TAG]]</code></p>
<blockquote>
<p>OPTIONS说明：<br>
-a :提交的镜像作者；<br>
-m :提交时的说明文字；</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355148-685120085.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
</blockquote>
<p><strong>将本地镜像推送到阿里云：</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355183-1271591295.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<ol>
<li><strong>进入阿里云开发者平台</strong>： <a href="https://promotion.aliyun.com/ntms/act/kubernetes.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://promotion.aliyun.com/ntms/act/kubernetes.html</a></li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355268-15379134.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<ol start="2">
<li><strong>创建仓库镜像：</strong></li>
</ol>
<p>选择控制台，进入容器镜像服务</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355186-1250579359.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355188-2121481158.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355189-1572182599.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355191-110352691.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355173-1037200296.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355115-219620319.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<ol start="3">
<li><strong>将镜像推送到阿里云：</strong> 将镜像推送到阿里云registry</li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355110-581508218.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>执行指令脚本：</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">docker login --username=zzyybuy registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-sh">docker tag cea1bb40441c registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/atguiguwh/myubuntu:1.1

</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-sh">docker push registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/atguiguwh/myubuntu:1.1
</code></pre>
<p>上面命令是我自己本地的，你自己酌情处理，不要粘贴我的</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355163-1237717578.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>将阿里云上的镜像下载到本地：</strong> 下载到本地</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355212-1872944024.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">docker pull registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/atguiguwh/myubuntu:1.1
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h1 id="最后">最后：</h1>
<blockquote>
<p>“在这个最后的篇章中，我要表达我对每一位读者的感激之情。你们的关注和回复是我创作的动力源泉，我从你们身上吸取了无尽的灵感与勇气。我会将你们的鼓励留在心底，继续在其他的领域奋斗。感谢你们，我们总会在某个时刻再次相遇。”</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3084824/202502/3084824-20250212084355233-176210615.gif" alt="在这里插入图片描述" loading="lazy"></p>
</blockquote>

</div>
